Package io.github.ascopes.jct.utils

Class StringUtils

java.lang.Object
io.github.ascopes.jct.utils.StringUtils
@API(since="0.0.1", status=INTERNAL) public final class StringUtils extends Object
Utilities for string manipulation used internally in this library.
Since:
0.0.1
Author:
Ashley Scopes

  • Method Details

    • toWordedList

      public static String toWordedList(List<? extends CharSequence> words, CharSequence connector, CharSequence lastConnector)
      Take the given list of strings and produce a connected single string, separating all but the last element by the connector value, and the last element by the lastConnector element.

      This is designed to be able to take an input such as List.of("foo", "bar", "baz"), and be able to produce a string result such as "foo, bar, or baz" (where connector in this case would be ", " and lastConnector would be ", or ".

      If no arguments are available, then an empty string is output instead.

      Effectively, this is a more complex version of String.join(CharSequence, CharSequence...).

      Parameters:
      words - the words to connect.
      connector - the connector string to use.
      lastConnector - the last connector string to use.
      Returns:
      the resulting string.

    • leftPad

      public static String leftPad(String content, int length, char paddingChar)
      Left-pad the given content with the given padding char until it is the given length.
      Parameters:
      content - the content to process.
      length - the max length of the resultant content.
      paddingChar - the character to pad with.
      Returns:
      the padded string.

    • indexOfLine

      public static int indexOfLine(String content, int lineNumber)
      Find the index for the start of the given line number (1-indexed).

      This assumes lines use UNIX line endings ('\n').

      The first line number will always be at index 0. If the line is not found, then -1 is returned.

      Parameters:
      content - the content to read through.
      lineNumber - the 1-indexed line number to find.
      Returns:
      the index of the line.

    • indexOfEndOfLine

      public static int indexOfEndOfLine(String content, int startAt)
      Find the index of the next UNIX end of line ('\n') character from the given offset.

      If there is no further line feed, then the length of the string is returned.

      Parameters:
      content - the content to read through.
      startAt - the 0-indexed position to start at in the string.
      Returns:
      the index of the end of line or end of string, whichever comes first.

    • formatNanos

      public static String formatNanos(long nanos)
      Format a given number of nanoseconds into a string with a meaningful time unit, and then return it.
      Parameters:
      nanos - the nanosecond time to format.
      Returns:
      the formatted string, in the format {time}{unit}.

    • quoted

      public static String quoted(Object object)
      Wrap the string representation of the given argument in double-quotes.

      Backslashes will be doubled (i.e. '\' will become '\\'), and double-quotes within the string representation of the object will have a backslash prefixed (i.e. '"' will become '\"').

      Parameters:
      object - the object to produce a quoted string representation of.
      Returns:
      the string representation, surrounded by double quotes.

    • quotedIterable

      public static String quotedIterable(Iterable<?> iterable)
      Produce a string representation of the iterable, quoting each member.
      Parameters:
      iterable - the iterable to process.
      Returns:
      the string representation of the iterable, with each member quoted (unless null).
